text: The government has announced a new tax reform to reduce inequality.
A major cyber attack has compromised user data from several companies.
Hospitals are overwhelmed due to a spike in COVID-19 cases.
The recent floods caused by heavy rains displaced thousands of people.
The president met with international leaders to discuss climate change.
A local startup is developing an innovative AI-powered medical assistant.
Police have launched an investigation into a large-scale financial fraud.
Teachers are protesting for better wages and improved school facilities.
A new law was passed to regulate the use of facial recognition technology.
Environmental groups are raising concerns about deforestation in the Amazon.
